name: Hauntsfield
overview: Oh no! Someone has stolen all the pumpkins from your farm, and the Hauntsfield festival is tomorrow! Get to know the residents of Hauntsfield and its outskirts, and hopefully get your pumpkins back in time to save the festival... Hauntsfield is a short and sweet Halloween RPG designed for Game Boy. Play time is 20-30 minutes. Hauntsfield has spooky themes, but is not scary and is appropriate for all ages.
